title: Championship riven sorsa
body: Végre dűlőre jutott a Riot a CS Riven skinnel kapcsolatban. A régi ownerek kapnak egy új loading screent és ingame effecteket. És ezen felül bónuszba egy újabb "soha többet" ígéretet. Reméljük ez már a kisujjrázós "sohasohasoha többet" nem pedig a standard.

replies.body:
Limited Edition Skins

Limited Edition skins are only available for a limited time, after which they will not be available for purchase again in the future. These skins include ALL holiday skins released before December 2011. These include skins like Kitty Kat Katarina, Ice Toboggan Corki, and Snow Bunny Nidalee. 

Limited Edition also includes skins tied to special events such as PAX Jax, Riot Squad Singed, etc. The availability of future Limited Edition skins will be on a case-by-case basis depending on the event. For example, some will only be available for attendees of an event and some will be available to purchase in the Store for a limited time. These particular skins will no longer be available for purchase after they are retired


EVENT LIMITED SKINS


Special Event skins were given away at gaming conventions and events, such as PAX, Gamescom, and various other regional events. The following skins are currently considered Limited and are not sold in the store.
World Finals

Championship Riven (given away during the Season 2 World Finals, no longer available)
Penny Arcade Expo (PAX)

PAX Twisted Fate (PAX 2009)
PAX Jax (PAX East/Prime 2010 & PAX East 2011)
PAX Sivir (PAX Prime 2011)
